comments.body:
Please add a comment above the `license_file` line that says:

```
# License file manually packaged. See: https://github.com/ppannuto/python-titlecase/pull/71
```

as a reminder to check if the license file is included in future releases.
Addressed in 2beb30c1db58ed6028d0ab11c161d2c96e03e2b7. Thank you for the feedback and for opening the PR in https://github.com/ppannuto/python-titlecase/pull/71, @synapticarbors.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +40,44 @@  license: MIT
  # License file manually packaged. See: https://github.com/ppannuto/python-titlecase/pull/71
  license_file: LICENSE.md

extra:
